com.revolsys.gis.algorithm

Class LocationOfPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.gis.algorithm.LocationOfPoint

  • public class LocationOfPoint
extends Object
    Computes the LineStringLocation of the point on a LineString nearest a given point. The nearest point is not necessarily unique, but this class always computes the nearest point closest to the start of the linestring.

      • locate

        public LineStringLocation locate(Point inputPt)
        Find the nearest location along a LineString to a given point.
        Parameters:
        inputPt - the coordinate to locate
        Returns:
        the location of the nearest point

      • locateAfter

        public LineStringLocation locateAfter(Point inputPt,
                             LineStringLocation minLocation)
        Find the nearest location along a LineString to a given point after the specified minimum LineStringLocation. If possible the location returned will be strictly greater than the minLocation. If this is not possible, the value returned will equal minLocation. (An example where this is not possible is when minLocation = [end of line] ).
        Parameters:
        inputPt - the coordinate to locate
        minLocation - the minimum location for the point location
        Returns:
        the location of the nearest point
